testcase.name: Accessibility Audit › Homepage - WCAG 2.1 AA Compliance
testcase.system-out: Accessibility Scan Results: Total violations: 0 Total passes: 24 PASSED RULES: 1. aria-allowed-attr: Ensure an element's role supports its ARIA attributes 2. aria-conditional-attr: Ensure ARIA attributes are used as described in the specification of the element's role 3. aria-deprecated-role: Ensure elements do not use deprecated roles 4. aria-hidden-body: Ensure aria-hidden="true" is not present on the document body. 5. aria-hidden-focus: Ensure aria-hidden elements are not focusable nor contain focusable elements 6. aria-prohibited-attr: Ensure ARIA attributes are not prohibited for an element's role 7. aria-required-attr: Ensure elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes 8. aria-roles: Ensure all elements with a role attribute use a valid value 9. aria-valid-attr-value: Ensure all ARIA attributes have valid values 10. aria-valid-attr: Ensure attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes 11. avoid-inline-spacing: Ensure that text spacing set through style attributes can be adjusted with custom stylesheets 12. button-name: Ensure buttons have discernible text 13. bypass: Ensure each page has at least one mechanism for a user to bypass navigation and jump straight to the content 14. color-contrast: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds 15. document-title: Ensure each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element 16. duplicate-id-aria: Ensure every id attribute value used in ARIA and in labels is unique 17. html-has-lang: Ensure every HTML document has a lang attribute 18. html-lang-valid: Ensure the lang attribute of the <html> element has a valid value 19. link-in-text-block: Ensure links are distinguished from surrounding text in a way that does not rely on color 20. link-name: Ensure links have discernible text 21. list: Ensure that lists are structured correctly 22. listitem: Ensure <li> elements are used semantically 23. meta-viewport: Ensure <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming 24. nested-interactive: Ensure interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies
